forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible this morning with partly cloudy skies for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
